Articles.Content:
I started using the CSS mod yesterday but i havent got it into orbit jet everytime i decouple the boosters my shuttle flies for about 10 more seconds and then starts to flip out and i can't get it back under controle even when i decouple the main tank form the shuttle.

can someone please help me with this.

I think you mean RSS, but without a pic of your craft (specifically your shuttle engines) it sounds like you are not firing your engines through your center of mass. Also, if you are using RSS are you using FAR at all?

Unless there is a mod that imports cascading style sheets...

... actually that would be kind of cool.

He could mean component space shuttle, but I don't think that's been updated in a while
